author: cbs8
title: Autonomous Vehicles Land, Water, Air 2015-2035 - Covers the Whole Topic of Autonomous Vehicles On-Road, Off-Road, On Water, Underwater and in the Air
text:
Research and Markets
DUBLIN , Aug. 21, Research and Markets ( http://www.researchandmarkets.com/research/f3fskz/autonomous ) has announced the addition of the "Autonomous Vehicles Land, Water, Air 2015-2035" report to their offering.
Chief executives, business planning and marketing VPs and other interested parties such as investors need to grasp what is one market - autonomous vehicles of every type - and how they have so many components and systems in common. They wish to benchmark best practice and identify trends and this report is the first to pull it all together. Uniquely, it covers the whole topic of autonomous vehicles on-road, off-road, on water, underwater and in the air, whether carrying passengers or not. Indeed, those that are only occasionally autonomous during use and those that are only weakly autonomous are identified and discussed, not least because most of them are headed to be fully autonomous in due course. Autonomous cars are dealt with soberly in the context of greater successes.
Only this report is up to date and global in reach, being based on interviews, events and data analysis almost entirely in 2015 and 2014. It is not an academic treatise nor is it simply a consolidation of what is on the web. A high proportion of the tables and figures are original. There are slides from recent conferences across the world. It is analysis, so the negatives are also presented.
Key Topics Covered:
1. EXECUTIVE SUMMARY
2. INTRODUCTION
3. TECHNOLOGIES FOR AUTONOMOUS VEHICLES
4. AUTONOMOUS CARS AND TAXIS
5. OFF-ROAD LAND AVS
6. PERSONAL AND COMMERCIAL AVS
7. AUTONOMOUS MARINE VEHICLES - SURFACE CRAFT
8. AUTONOMOUS UNDERWATER VEHICLES (AUVS)
9. UNMANNED AERIAL VEHICLES (UAVS)
Companies Mentioned
Autosub6000 UK BMW DRDO India Florida Atlantic University USA Google JAMSTEC Japan Kongsberg Norway Mercedes Monterey Bay Aquarium Ocean Research Institute USA NASA USA OceanServer Technology USA Teledyne USA , Iceland Uber Woods Hole Oceanographic Institution USA a.r.s Technologies GmbH Germany For more information visit http://www.researchandmarkets.com/research/f3fskz/autonomous
Media Contact:
Laura Wood , +353-1-481-1716, press@researchandmarkets.net
